welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Schilde, a charming city known for its idyllic countryside and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and experience all that Schilde has to offer and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Zoersel Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Woensdrecht Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Woensdrecht Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brussels Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Brussels Airport, primarily used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The General Aviation Terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a comfortable and efficient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
